Struct CalcPairArray¶

  • Defined in File Treelist.h

Struct Documentation¶

struct CalcPairArray¶

A structure for containing an array of previous calculation information, including which fragments have been already calculated for.

Public Functions

void push_back(double speciation_rate, double time, bool fragment)¶

Adds an extra PreviousCalcPair object to the calc_array vector with the supplied variables.

Parameters
  • speciation_rate: the speciation rate of the past calculation
  • time: the time of the past calculation
  • fragment: bool of whether fragments were used in the past calculation

bool hasPair(double speciation_rate, double time, bool fragment)¶

Checks whether the calculation with the supplied variables has already been performed.

Return
bool true if the calculation has already been performed.
Parameters
  • speciation_rate: the speciation rate to check for
  • time: the time to check for
  • fragment: bool for checking if fragments were used

bool hasPair(double speciation_rate, double time)¶

Checks whether the calculation with the supplied variables has already been performed. Overloaded version not requiring a fragment specified.

Return
bool true if the calculation has already been performed.
Parameters
  • speciation_rate: the speciation rate to check for
  • time: the time to check for
  • fragment: bool for checking if fragments were used

Public Members

vector<PreviousCalcPair> calc_array¶
